house_listing.house_description: First floor unit, steps to water, located on quiet end of harbour point, gated community. Fee includes guard, trash maintenance, great view of rudee inlet. Nice pool & grounds. Heat pump, disposal, dishwasher 3 years old. Great for empty nesters who want waterfront & no hassles.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Balcony, Boat Dock, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Club House, Fenced,Walk-In Closet(s)
